{{Description|Mysterious drums. According to legends, these instruments were meant to symbolize the union between the Order of Skeptics and the Pari.|[[Loading Screen]]}}
'''Korybantes''' are items that can be found in the [[Girdle of the Sands]], [[Sumeru]]. They are used for the {{Quest|Awakening's Real Sound}}.

==Types==
{{Items by Category List|Korybantes}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* In Greek mythology, the {{W|Korybantes}} were the armed and crested worshipers of the Phrygian mother goddess {{W|Cybele}}, who were known for their frenzied ritual dances to the beat of drums.
* Each of the Kory drums are named after the five {{W|skandha}} of personality in Buddhism: ''rūpa'' (form), ''saṃjñā'' (perception), ''saṅkhāra'' (formation), ''vedanā'' (sensation), and ''vijñāna'' (consciousness).
